content: we have included two options for knitting your cozy you can choose to knit it flat and seam it up or knit in the round so there is no seaming at the end supplies us #7 4 5mm straight or double pointed knitting needles worsted weight yarn of choice yarn needle pattern notes each cozy takes approximately 30 yards my gauge for a 4x4 square was 18 stitches x 25 row finished size when seamed 5 1/4 in wide x 5 in tall these sleeves will fit most pint sized ice cream cups
